Thanks for submitting your app for Ubuntu. You can check the review process and status of your submission in <nowiki>[[https://myapps.developer.ubuntu.com/|My Apps]]</nowiki>.

One of the Application Review Board members will take a look at your app soon. They may have some questions or comments for you, or may ask for some fixes. Once you've made any changes they request, they'll vote on your submission, and notify you of the result.

For more information on the Application Review Board, see <nowiki>[[AppReviewBoard]]</nowiki>.
